an10.188:1.1: “I will teach you the principle that results in suffering and that which results in happiness. …
an10.188:1.3: And what is the principle that results in suffering?
an10.188:1.6: This is called the principle that results in suffering.
an10.188:2.1: And what is the principle that results in happiness?
an10.188:2.4: This is called the principle that results in happiness.”
